dcterms:description: A deterministic MDP consisting of 11 labeled states linked together in a chain, where at each state, there are 100 actions to take, M % of which are terminal actions.
dcterms:title: Tightrope

dcterms:description: Tasks where the goal is to stack blocks to achieve a functional objective while avoiding collisions with obstacles.
dcterms:title: Construction

dcterms:creator: Victor Bapst

dcterms:description: A new task in the style of previous Construction tasks where the goal is to stack blocks to enable a marble to get from its original starting position to a goal location while avoiding obstacles.
dcterms:title: Marble Run

dcterms:description: An evaluation platform for general agents that provides a suite of Atari games for testing reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Atari
